content:
Hello,
I am trying to perform $subsumes operation on FHIR Server, where codeA and codeB are same. The result should be "equivalent" as per the concept-subsumption-outcome but I get "not-subsumed" as the result.

GET [base]/CodeSystem/$subsumes?system=http://snomed.info/sct&codeA=3738000&codeB=3738000
Response:
{
"resourceType": "Parameters",
"parameter": [
{
"name": "outcome",
"valueCode": "not-subsumed"
}
]
}

Can someone help?
Thanks in advance

Looks like the server you're using has a bug.
See, for example, https://r4.ontoserver.csiro.au/fhir/CodeSystem/$subsumes?system=http://snomed.info/sct&codeA=3738000&codeB=3738000

Yes. I am using HAPI FHIR Server.
Is this a known issue? How can I go about with it? Any help will be appreciated. @Grahame Grieve
There is a #hapi stream, where you may get a quicker response...
Thank you. I have posted the problem there.
